about_the_game:
Dive into the adventure of "Ascendaria"
Get ready for an exhilarating adventure with Ascendaria, a captivating game where the main objective is to climb as high as possible through diverse and fascinating worlds. But be careful, a fall can happen at any moment, forcing you to restart your ascent from the beginning.

As a player, you will need to use your skills, dexterity, and ingenuity to overcome various obstacles and reach ever higher heights. Each world you traverse is unique, filled with specific challenges, hidden secrets, and enchanting landscapes.

Endless Ascent: Climb as high as possible in a constantly evolving world, where each ascent is a new adventure.

Varied Worlds: Traverse diverse environments, each with its own themes, enemies, and unique challenges.

Constant Risks: At any moment, a mistake can cause you to fall, testing your perseverance and determination.

Upgrades and Bonuses: Throughout your ascent, find and collect upgrades, bonuses, and even special skills to help you progress.

Exploration and Discovery: Each world is filled with secrets to uncover, encouraging exploration and curiosity.

Progressive Challenges: The higher you climb, the more complex and challenging the obstacles become, pushing you to improve your skills.

Dive into the Adventure
Whether you're a fan of intense challenges or a curious explorer, Ascendaria promises to captivate you with its intriguing worlds and addictive gameplay. Prepare for a unique experience where each climb is a test of your skill and endurance.

Take on the challenge and see how high you can climb in Ascendaria. The summit awaits!

name: Ascendaria

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-Bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, or Windows 8
  • Processor: 2.70 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 with 4 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.70 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 with 8 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: Climb as high as possible through diverse and fascinating worlds. Overcome unique challenges, discover hidden secrets, and collect upgrades and bonuses. But beware, a single mistake can send you tumbling down. Dive into the adventure and see how high you can climb!
